description: This file defines an abstract base class 'ChunkingStrategy' for different chunking strategies used in document processing. It includes an abstract method 'chunk' that must be implemented by subclasses, and a concrete method 'clean_text' for sanitizing text by replacing multiple whitespace characters with single instances.

classes.name: ChunkingStrategy
classes.description: An abstract base class for defining various document chunking strategies.

methods.name: chunk
methods.description: An abstract method that should be implemented to split a Document into chunks.

methods.name: clean_text
methods.description: A method that cleans input text by replacing multiple whitespace characters with single instances.
